content.section_header: Select the SYNONYM for each bold word

content.question: Radiocarbon dating is used to establish the antiquity of artifacts.
The teammates appraised each other’s performances.
The neighbors reposed their trust in small claims court to decide who was responsible for the fence.
Dan used his biggest knife to cleave the watermelon into halves.
Roger had a hard time identifying his nondescript umbrella in the lost-and-found.

content.section_header: Select the ANTONYM for each bold word

content.question: Daria took care with her guest list to make sure conversation at her dinner parties was always scintillating.
Detectives scrutinized the accident scene before preparing their report.
Music purists depreciate new fusion styles.
Synthetic fabrics offer both advantages and disadvantages over cotton and wool.
A facsimile of the signed contract was all the banker needed to begin processing the loan.

content.question: Allure refers to the power to
Transmuting is most closely related to

If something is impervious, it is
Which of the following does not describe a quandary?

content.section_header: Read the passage and answer the questions

passage: What do you picture when you hear the word suburb? Many people imagine rows of nondescript, boxlike houses, each a facsimile of the others. They imagine that the people living in the houses are all the same, too. It might be easy to make such an assumption from the outside. They can’t see beyond the sameness of the houses to realize that the individuals inside are different and distinctive.

Residents of houses in the suburbs, however, know just how unique they are, and how unique their communities are. Over time, as they make connections with friends and family within those communities, they become impervious to the judgment from outsiders. They know they don’t have to make a choice between reposing in a quiet suburban backyard and having scintillating conversations with fascinating people—they can have both. A good conversation can happen anywhere!

content.question: In line 2, nondescript means
The meaning of facsimile (line 3) is
In line 11, impervious most nearly means
The word reposing (line 13) most nearly means
In line 14, scintillating means
